experience.description: Leading full-stack development initiatives while contributing to business development strategies. Developing scalable web applications, analyzing market trends, identifying growth opportunities, and implementing solutions that drive business objectives and improve user experience.

Gained hands-on experience in full-stack web development through an intensive internship program. Worked on real-world projects, learned industry best practices, and collaborated with experienced developers to deliver functional web applications.

education.degree: B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering
education.description: Passionate about full stack web development. Focused on electronics, communication systems, and software development. Active participation in technical projects and coding competitions.
Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, and Computer Science as major subjects. Developed strong foundation in science and mathematics.
